metadata.name: WarpZone
metadata.description:
Warp zone is a mod for the binding of isaac that adds stuff from [url=https://foursouls.com/card-search/?origin=rwz] Warp Zone [/url] pack for the binding of isaac four souls. All of the items have unique functionality and you will not get bored playing with them! This mod brings some spice into variety of items. No run with items from this mod will be boring! This mod adds a variety of [list] [*]23 new passive items [*]11 new active items [*]4 new trinkets [*]10 new pick ups [/list]
[h2]Interactions[/h2] Full compability with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872] External item descriptions [/url] Russian translation in [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2881743468&searchtext=mod+translator] Mod translator [/url]
Our cool team: Coders - Aristotlepenguin, Goganidze Spriters - Skulldier, Lilboi, Yarik The Human, VectorV, Kars, TheGreatMrR, Goganidze and The Corrupted One Thumbnail by Goganidze Ideas - Skulldier, Aristotlepenguin, Kars Special thanks to RightDayToSay for crowdfunder sprite.
